title: username and password
extract: A username is a name that uniquely identifies someone on a computer system. For example, a computer may be setup with multiple accounts, with different usernames for each account. ... This username/password combination is referred to as a login, and is often required for users to log in to websites.
extract_html: A username is a name that uniquely identifies someone on a computer system. For example, a computer may be setup with multiple accounts, with different usernames for each account. ... This username/password combination is referred to as a login, and is often required for users to log in to websites.
